name: 2D Shooter (ReefM)
description:
The 2D game shooter is the second project in this course basically, it's a spaceship that's fighting alien spaceships.

Summary for the modification:

1- 4 more enemies. 

2- changed the background color in the main menu.

3- changed the speed in the fire rate. 

4- added more elements and asteroids.
